name: planka
description: Planka is a lightweight self-hosted kanban board for managing tasks and projects. It includes drag-and-drop cards, user assignments, labels, and a clean UI akin to Trello.
features: Kanban boards: Organize tasks in boards with customizable lists and drag-and-drop card management.
Card assignments: Assign tasks to team members with due dates and priority indicators.
Labels and tags: Categorize cards with color-coded labels for visual organization and filtering.
Checklists: Break down tasks into subtasks with checkbox lists to track completion progress.
File attachments: Attach files and images to cards for documentation and reference materials.
Activity tracking: View card history and activity logs to monitor changes and updates.
Board sharing: Collaborate with team members by sharing boards with configurable access permissions.
Card comments: Discuss tasks with threaded comments and @mentions for team communication.
Due date reminders: Set deadlines on cards with visual indicators for overdue and upcoming tasks.
Board templates: Create reusable board templates for recurring projects and workflows.
Search functionality: Find cards quickly by searching titles, descriptions, and comments.
Mobile responsive: Access and manage boards from mobile devices with an optimized interface.
